selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to perform arithmetic operations and comparisons on the roughness values to determine if Coral is the roughest.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the final answer in the required format after determining if Coral is the roughest.

new_skill_specs.name: compare_roughness_values
new_skill_specs.purpose: Compare roughness values of different materials to determine which one is the roughest.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The label of the material with the highest roughness value.
edge_cases: All materials have the same roughness value.
